error-is-not-activist: Error, you must be an activist to access this page
error-is-not-connected: Error, you don't have an account yet.
error-is-not-finish: You haven't finished the form. Come back later...
error-is-not-finish-description: This page allows you to view your score, but you must complete the form first.
error-not-activist-description: This page is reserved for people who have requested to be involved in this campaign.
error-not-connected-description: This is probably because you haven't finished the form.
form-registration-level: What is your level of study?
help-us-presentation: To get as representative a study as possible, we need as much data as we can. To help us, please share this form!
home-presentation: The purpose of this questionnaire is to map and present student poverty. The aim is both to inform each student of the level of poverty they face and to quantify this poverty on a large scale.
home-spoler: This form will only take you 5 minutes to complete and will help us highlight the situation students are facing.
intro-subtitle: Before we begin, we need some information to complete the stats
join-us-presentation: To help us defend students' rights, we need your help! You can ask to be contacted by clicking the button below.
joined-us-presentation: We'll contact you as soon as possible!
new-qr-code-help: This text will help us know the origin of these responses
new-qr-code-label: Reason for the new QR code
phone-error: This phone number seems invalid. If this happens repeatedly, enter '-'
register-subtitle: Before we begin, we need some information to verify that you are a human ü§ñ
share-presentation: Here you can share the form with all the students you know ü§ó
share-sms-link: Hello, I made a form that lets you evaluate student precarity. I obtained {n}% precarity with a precariscore of {p} üò± ‚Äî take the test and tell me your result ü§ó
thank-presentation: We defend students daily, and the more data we have the better we can highlight the difficulties students face. This form is very valuable to us ü§ó
welcome-in-pap-description: Here you can manage and create QR codes for occasions where they are needed, for example tonight's door-to-door campaign ü§ó
